articles.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore
articles.title: The WGA and the AMPTP are having their first meeting since the writing strike began - The Verge
articles.description: The Alliance of Motion Picture and Television Producers has reportedly asked the Writers Guild of America to meet this Friday to discuss resuming labor contract talks.
articles.content:
The WGA and the AMPTP are having their first meeting since the writing strike began
